DOC.brief_summary: The primary goal study determine association great exposure vancomycin development nephrotoxicity . The secondary goal estimate cost hospital associate nephrotoxic event .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old time hospital admission Had absolute neutrophil count ≥ 1000 cells/mm^3 Received > 48 hour intravenous vancomycin therapy Had one vancomycin trough level report within 96 hour therapy initiation Had baseline serum creatinine level < 2.0 mg/dL baseline creatinine clearance level ≥ 30 mL/min Previous diagnosis cystic fibrosis
